author: rwatler
msg: Page Manager Update
- remove OJB managed collections that maintained the
folder/document hierarchy and by doing so removed
the requirement to update parent folders upon child
folder/document addition/removal; also eliminated
the notorious "dumb" update in the DB Page Manager
that propagated deep updates for even the most
trivial updateFolder() operation.
- make shallow updateFolder() operation the default
for both the Castor and DB Page Manager impls.
- implement updateFolder() API that optionally does
a deep update if so specified; this implied the
implementation of a deep update in Castor and a
shallow update in the DB Page Managers.
- corrected a caching bug in the Castor impl that
caused updated folders and document to not appear
in the parent folder node collections in some
circumstances.
- added a set of methods to the Page Manager API that
enable it to return folder based queries formerly
only available on the Folder om API.
- added more functionality to the DB Page Manager
Cache that cleans up the new transient child
caches in folder nodes upon reap; this should
afford a more conservative working set for the
Page Manager and OJB.
